headline.main: Photography Pulitzers Recognize Aftermath of Violence Here and Abroad

docs.abstract: Daniel Berehulak’s gripping coverage in The New York Times of state-sanctioned killings in the Philippines and E. Jason Wambsgans’s chronicling for the Chicago Tribune of a 10-year-old gunshot victim’s recovery were awarded the Pulitzer Prize for breaking news and feature photography, respectively.
